Class ShoppingDao

java.lang.Object
DAO.DAO<ShoppingCartItem>
DAO.ShoppingDao
public class ShoppingDao extends DAO<ShoppingCartItem>
Data Access Object (DAO) for managing shopping cart data in a database. This class provides methods to interact with the shopping cart table, including adding, retrieving, and removing items from the cart.

  • Method Details

    • findAll

      public ArrayList<ShoppingCartItem> findAll(int userId, HashMap<String,Object> sortParams)
      Retrieves all items from the shopping cart for a specific user.
      Specified by:
      findAll in class DAO<ShoppingCartItem>
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose shopping cart items are to be retrieved
      sortParams - optional parameters to sort the results (currently not used)
      Returns:
      a list of ShoppingCartItem objects representing the user's cart items

    • addNewLineItem

      public boolean addNewLineItem(ShoppingCartItem item, Map<String,String> additionalFields)
      Adds a new line item to the shopping cart.
      Parameters:
      item - the ShoppingCartItem to be added
      additionalFields - additional fields (if any) to be added to the new item
      Returns:
      true if the item was added successfully, false otherwise

    • removeLineItem

      public int removeLineItem(int id)
      Removes a line item from the shopping cart by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the line item to be removed
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected by the delete operation

    • updateById

      public int updateById(int id, String table, Map<String,Object> updateFields)
      Updates a record in the shopping cart by its ID (not implemented in this class).
      Specified by:
      updateById in class DAO<ShoppingCartItem>
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the record to be updated
      table - the table name (shopping_cart)
      updateFields - a map of columns and their new values
      Returns:
      0 as the update is not supported for this class
